page.description: Change the display name for a user's TransForm account.

return.name: JSON Object
return.description: Returns an object with these properties:

section.title: Node
Xbasic
section.example: dim apikey as c = "Your_api_key" dim postdata as c dim url as c = "/changeUserDisplayName/value_of_userid?userDisplayName=value%5fof%5fuserDisplayName" dim pr as p pr = a5dialogHelper_transformAPIQuery(url,postdata,apikey) if pr.error = .f. then dim result as c result = pr.result else dim errorText as c errorText = pr.errorText end if
